name: Mariusz Jan Skobel
role_name: Senior Software Engineer (with overlap into ML Engineer)
profile_summary:
Senior Software Engineer with 10+ years of experience in software development and a robust focus on ML Engineering. Expert in **Python**, **MLOps**, and **CI/CD** practices, leveraging tools such as **Kubeflow**, **Airflow**, and **Prefect** for efficient machine learning pipeline management. Proven capabilities in developing APIs and integrating **TensorFlow**, **Scikit-learn**, and **PyTorch** for ML models. Proficient in utilizing **Google Cloud Platform** services including **GKE**, **BigQuery**, **BigTable**, **GCS**, and **Dataproc** to build scalable, cloud-native solutions. Strong background in maintaining Agile and DevOps methodologies to streamline development workflows using tools like **Gitlab**, **Jira**, and **Productboard**.

Demonstrated success in creating high-performance software in sectors such as healthcare and finance, with hands-on expertise in **React**, **Next.js**, **Vue**, **Node.js**, **FastAPI**, and **Django**. Adept at leading the development of enterprise platforms that embed AI/ML capabilities for real-time analytics, automation, and intelligent decision-making. Experienced in microservices architecture and event-driven systems, ensuring secure and compliant solutions meeting standards like HIPAA, FHIR, PCI DSS, and SOC 2. Committed to building systems that drive meaningful impact through technical excellence.
